line_1: My soul from Death cou'd one short Hour reprieve.
line_2: Not all the wealth that lavish Chance cou'd give

line_1: Grant me but a short reprieve,
line_2: Stay thy hand, some respite give,

line_1: Give your belly a feast, and your breech a reprieve.
line_2: Come along to my house and these penances leave,

line_1: Do thou, whilst Fate permits a short reprieve,
line_2: Do thou, dear Thames, this parting wish receive;
